msg: a few jar name changes, more to come

author: ashish
msg: Applied patch from jira issue OFBIZ-2684 (In Accounting invoice section the InvoiceSubBar Menu all options are not working properly, convert it to ftl, so that all functionality can be run.)
There is bug in the Menu Widget code and it will be handled in separate issue created and referred on the above jira issue.
For now I have commented out the code of Menus.xml from InvoiceScreens.xml file and on fixing this bug in menu widget code the artifact will be reused again.
Thanks Rishi for your contribution on this.

author: jukka
msg: The source plugin is automatically enabled in release mode by the new parent POM.
